"<%me>, has there been anything strange: "It would be nice if there's not, but I just go a little worried."
"How should I say this? Like you're being watched, or targeted maybe?"
"Maybe it's just my imagination. Sorry for saying weird things."
"Just recently, it seems that a lot of big events are happening lately. Even I've been noticing."
"But no one will tell me exactly what's going on, so I get worried about you."
"But I guess it's okay. I'm okay as long as you keep coming to see me."
"All I can do is wait for you to come to me, so I can talk to you."
"But still, if I can I'd still like to see you as often as possible."
"I'll always be here waiting for you."
